ActCompetition Tribunal Act
PrecisDesignation of the HONOURABLE ANDREW D. LITTLE of Toronto, Ontario, a member of the Competition Tribunal, to be Chairman of the Competition Tribunal, to hold office for a term ending on November 4, 2027, effective April 30, 2022.
